What kind of world do we want to live in?

Who Are We?

A humanitarian organization that believes in connection free of judgement and labels. The mission of The Social Condition is to encourage the creation of authentic, empathic relationships through global collaboration. We believe that our unique expression as human beings is only able to be understood within the limitations of our current world. Our vision is diverse unity, social acceptance, and understanding. Each day, we call upon you to join us in creating change at the individual, community, and global levels. Our goal is to foster expansive awareness and acceptance at a personal level, promote advocacy and de-isolation within our communities, and encourage complimentary individuality within a united world.
